messages.banner.authorizeContent.body: Before you can start enjoying Email Templates and Tracking, you'll need to connect to your Gmail account.
messages.banner.authorizeContent.title: SalesConnect Toolbar
messages.banner.nuxContent.completeBody: We're going to take the training wheels off. Go forth and enjoy pure email productivity bliss. And of course, if you need anything, we're always here to help.
messages.banner.nuxContent.createTemplateBody: Email Templates help you save time and drive consistent messaging. Ready to create your first template?
messages.banner.nuxContent.liveFeedBody: Great! Now, let's track that email. Ever wonder what happens to that email once it reaches a person's Inbox? Marketo Sales will tell you in real-time when an email is opened or a link is clicked.
messages.banner.nuxContent.sendFirstBody: You've successfully installed your plug-in for Gmail! Let's get you started by sending your first trackable email.
messages.banner.nuxContent.sendingFirstBody: We've saved you time with this test email by using the "Test Email" template. All you have to do now is hit the Send & Connect button -- which takes this normal email and sends it with real-time tracking.
messages.banner.nuxContent.sendingSecondBody: Your templates are made available right below the formatting toolbar. Just click on the button with your template's name on it and watch the magic happen.
messages.banner.nuxContent.sendingSecondSecondary: Don't forget to hit the Send & Connect button to send your email.
messages.banner.nuxContent.sendSecondBody: Now that we've shown you how to create a template, we'll show you how to use it the next time you send an email.
messages.banner.nuxContent.sendSecondTitle: Send an Email Using Your Template

messages.gmail.prepopulate.firstEmailBody:
Hey!

I'm testing out this new email productivity tool. It lets me manage my inbox, quickly send emails using templates and then track what happens to them after I hit "send."

The tool will tell me in real-time when you click on this link:
http://www.toutapp.com

Let me know when you've clicked on the link, and we'll compare notes?

Thanks,

messages.web.updateCampaignTemplates.instructions:
This template is being used as an email step in the Campaigns below. To update those Campaigns with the changes you've just made, select the individual Campaigns you'd like to change and click "update".

Please note that by updating the messaging in any Campaigns below, you will be overriding any customized messaging in those Campaigns.
